meanings.sent1: The dividual person stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: Each dividual flower in the garden had its own unique color.
meanings.sent3: The dividual cat insisted on having its own chair at the dinner table.
meanings.sent4: Her dividual personality shone brightly in the group project.
meanings.sent5: The dividual stars twinkled in the night sky, each with its own brilliance.

meanings.definition: Capable of being divided or separated
meanings.sent1: The dividual cake could easily be split into smaller pieces.
meanings.sent2: The dividual puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The dividual socks kept getting mixed up in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: Their dividual responsibilities were clearly defined in the team.
meanings.sent5: The dividual cells multiplied rapidly under the microscope.
